panels.description: The number of tasks
panels.title: Total Tasks

panels.description: Checkpoint completion rate calculated by (numberOfFailedCheckpoints) / (totalNumberOfCheckpoints)
panels.title: Max CPU Load

panels.description: Job by Uptime
panels.title: Backpressure by Task
Max GC Time Ratio pre Sec

panels.description: Whether the task is back-pressured.
panels.title: backpressured

panels.description: The time (in milliseconds) this task is busy (neither idle nor back pressured) per second. Can be NaN, if the value could not be calculated.
panels.title: Busy Time Ratio

panels.description: The time (in milliseconds) this task is back pressured (soft or hard) per second. It's a sum of softBackPressuredTimeMsPerSecond and hardBackPressuredTimeMsPerSecond.	This is divided by 1000ms to show the ratio.
panels.title: Backpressured Time

panels.description: Busy Time Ratio calculated by dividing busyTimeMsPerSecond by 1000
panels.title: Hard Backpressured Ratio

panels.description: The total number of records this operator/task has received.
panels.title: Num Records In per Sec

panels.description: The number of records this operator/task sends per second.
panels.title: Num Records Out per Sec

panels.description: CPU Load
panels.title: CPU Load

panels.description: Total Memory Used by adding used heap and non heap
panels.title: Total Memory Used

panels.description: The time (in milliseconds) spent garbage collecting per second for the given (or all) collector.
panels.title: GC Time Spent per Second (ms)

panels.description: Live Threads Count
panels.title: Live Threads Count

panels.description: The total number of bytes this task has read from a local source.
panels.title: Num Bytes In Local per Sec

panels.description: The number of bytes this task reads from a remote source per second.
panels.title: Num Bytes Remote In per Second

panels.description: The number of bytes this task reads from a remote source per second.
panels.title: Num Bytes Remote per Second

panels.description: The number of network buffers this task reads from a local source per second.
panels.title: Num Buffers Local In Per Sec

panels.description: The number of network buffers this task reads from a remote source per second.
panels.title: Num Buffers Remote In Per Sec

panels.description: The number of queued input buffers. (ignores LocalInputChannels which are using blocking subpartitions)
panels.title: Queued Input Buffer Size

panels.description: The number of bytes this task emits per second.
panels.title: Num Bytes Out per Sec

panels.description: The number of network buffers this task emits per second.
panels.title: Num Buffers Out per Sec

panels.description: Available Memory Segments by taking available and divided by total
panels.title: Available Memory Segments (%)

panels.description: The number of queued input buffers. (ignores LocalInputChannels which are using blocking subpartitions)
panels.title: Queued Input Buffers

panels.description: The number of queued output buffers. (ignores LocalInputChannels which are using blocking subpartitions)
panels.title: Queued Output Buffers

panels.description: The real size of queued input buffers in bytes. The size for local input channels is always `0` since the local channel takes records directly from the output queue.
panels.title: Queued Input Size

panels.description: The size of queued output buffers. (ignores LocalInputChannels which are using blocking subpartitions)
panels.title: Queued Output Size
